scripts.sync:dev: aws-vault exec asm-dev -- aws s3 sync --exclude="meta/*" ./s3_asset_bucket/ s3://aifa-boxset-drop-asset-backend-dev
scripts.sync:staging: aws-vault exec asm-staging -- aws s3 sync --exclude="meta/*" ./s3_asset_bucket/ s3://aifa-boxset-drop-asset-backend-staging
scripts.sync:prod: aws-vault exec asm-prod -- aws s3 sync --exclude="meta/*" ./s3_asset_bucket/ s3://aifa-boxset-drop-asset-backend-prod
scripts.sync-meta:dev: aws-vault exec asm-dev -- aws s3 sync --content-type="application/json" ./s3_asset_bucket/meta/ s3://aifa-boxset-drop-asset-backend-dev/meta
scripts.sync-meta:staging: aws-vault exec asm-staging -- aws s3 sync --content-type="application/json" ./s3_asset_bucket/meta/ s3://aifa-boxset-drop-asset-backend-staging/meta
scripts.sync-meta:prod: aws-vault exec asm-prod -- aws s3 sync --content-type="application/json" ./s3_asset_bucket/meta/ s3://aifa-boxset-drop-asset-backend-prod/meta
